name: Connection

methods.name: deleteRows
methods.description: Invoked when external object records are deleted via the Salesforce user interface, APIs, or Apex.

methods.name: query
methods.description: Invoked by a SOQL query of an external object. A SOQL query is generated and executed when a user visits an external object’s list view or record detail page in Salesforce. Returns the results of the query.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Invoked by a SOSL query of an external object or when a user performs a Salesforce global search that also searches external objects. Returns the results of the query.

methods.name: sync
methods.description: Invoked when an administrator clicks Validate and Sync on the external data source detail page. Returns a list of tables that describe the external system’s schema.

methods.name: upsertRows
methods.description: Invoked when external object records are created or updated via the Salesforce user interface, APIs, or Apex.
